players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

You: "One mafia, one detective, one villager left besides me. Detective, please share if you have a guilty result; otherwise stay quiet. Bob and Diana: where were your heads last night? Any reads on Charlie’s kill?"
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. Please vote Diana today."
Diana: remained silent.

Diana: "Bob is either lying or got framed. If I were mafia, why kill Charlie, the easiest miselim? Alice, think: a lone mafioso would avoid a bold fake. Bob’s rushing a vote to end the day—feels agenda-driven."
You: "Bob, confirm you’re the detective. If so, why Diana N1 over Charlie/Me? Diana, give your full take: who do you think is mafia and why? Also, who do you vote now?"

Bob: "Yes, I’m the detective. I picked Diana N1 because she felt most likely to be mafia from her cautious opener. Result: mafia. Her silence, then deflecting, fits caught-wolf. Alice, please vote Diana with me."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
